channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
item.description: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end.”

item.title: Sorry, retirees — the 4% rule won’t work for you if Vanguard is right about where the stock market is headed
item.description: A “lost decade” of low stock returns can be devastating for older investors

item.title: American Eagle had Sydney Sweeney. But its lesser-known lingerie brand carried the day.
item.description: American Eagle raises outlook for the holiday quarter and the year on ‘strong momentum’ for sales.

item.title: AI air pocket, struggling consumer could prove a double whammy for stocks next year, says Bank of America
item.description: Don’t look for outsized gains from the S&P 500 next year, the headwinds are numerous warns Savita Subramanian.

item.title: Bank of America says ASML is its top semiconductor stock pick heading into 2026

item.title: The stock market believes Google is now winning the AI race over OpenAI, Nvidia
item.description: "Now, Gemini/TPU stocks trade at a premium relative to ChatGPT/GPU peers for the first time in nearly a decade," Wells Fargo's Ohsung Kwon said.

item.title: JSPR Explodes on Briquilimab Asthma Breakthrough
item.description: JSPR stock surges on positive briquilimab asthma trial data. Explore risks, rewards, and biotech trading lessons as shares gain big early today.

item.title: These dividend stocks are cheap and have high payout growth, says Wolfe
item.description: Investors looking for income-paying stocks can find some bargains in dividend aristocrats, according to Wolfe Research.
